purpose: The email is a call for papers for the International Symposium on Sustainable Systems Technologies and Green Computing (STGC) scheduled for October 15-17, 2025, in Dubrovnik, Croatia. It invites submissions of original research papers, case studies, and industry insights that focus on sustainable and energy-efficient software systems. The symposium aims to explore innovative approaches in technology and system development, with topics including energy-efficient software engineering, AI for sustainability, and green computing. Accepted papers will be published in IEEE Xplore. Key dates for submission and the symposium are provided, along with a link for more details.

conf_name_candidates.raw: The International Symposium on Sustainable Systems Technologies and Green Computing (STGC)
conf_name_candidates.evidence: The International Symposium on Sustainable Systems Technologies and Green Computing (STGC) | Dubrovnik, Croatia

conf_name_candidates.raw: 3rd International Conference on Federated Learning Technologies and Applications
conf_name_candidates.evidence: co-located with the 3rd International Conference on Federated Learning Technologies and Applications (FLTA 2025), which will take place on October 14-17, 2025

evidence_sentences: We are pleased to invite you to submit your original research papers, case studies, and industry insights to our upcoming symposium.
STGC is co-located with the 3rd International Conference on Federated Learning Technologies and Applications (FLTA 2025), which will take place on October 14-17, 2025, in Dubrovnik, Croatia.
STS aims to address the growing demand for sustainable, energy-efficient, and resilient software systems by exploring innovative approaches in technology and system development.

We welcome contributions on topics including, but not limited to: Energy-Efficient Software Engineering, Sustainable Architectures, AI for Sustainability, IoT-Enabled Sustainability, Green Computing, Scalability and Adaptability, Blockchain for Sustainability, Technology, Sociology, and Economy for Sustainable Development, Software Engineering for Sustainability.
Accepted papers will be published in IEEE Xplore in the proceedings of FLTA 2025.
For more details on submission guidelines and the symposium's scope, please visit our official webpage: STGC at FLTA 2025
